title: TFT FULL BOTS WHATS GOING ON
body: as tiitle says whats going on with tft?i mean even ranked games are full of bots??cant they see this?

replies.body: So i am not going nuts. every game has at least 5 river sprites that move with 200 apm that don't talk

Its driving me nuts so i wont play ranked tft atm cos of these bots,getting put with 7 bronze/silver bots when im in platinum, place for tiny lp gains and lose for huge lp loss.  Somethings i have noticed are these bot like players are river sprites with no icon(just black), make strange movement after battles and pick wheels, Never speak, seem to quite often get lux 2 star, have lightning  fast unit placement(i will scout the unit placement just before battle starts and it will be totally different when battle begins.
Yeah OCE TFT has been hit with bots as well, I think its to do with the moblie release. Does EUNE have the mobile tft beta release as well?

They aren't bots. They are mobile beta players. Players from other regions are making throwaway accounts to test mobile tft. Oce and Euw (possibly Eune too) are the only servers testers can play on atm in closed beta. There is also no chat or shop functions in mobile and you cannot change your player icon. Which is why theres so many default players who do not respond in chat.

Whats even more BS is that the bots get an additional items on win. 
It's that or their getting 1-2 items from every mob every mob round.
